name: Estrela
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
textInChatBox: Happy womans day!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised,I wanted to do something
outroText: On this day I want to thank you for your presence in my life, you are an important figure in me, you are a part of my heart and I know that although we often have arguments that will never change, no one will ever fill that place reserved especially for you, no one will never accompany me or help me as much as you, you are my best friend and I will always be there, if you want to cry, laugh or scream, I will be there, for you and forever.
replayText: I love you dummy, click HERE if you want to see it again
